summary: Toggle Werewolf Form on and off with a single button. Requires Script Dragon.
descriptionHtml:
With a single button, you can toggle Werewolf form. By default, the button is * on the number pad, but you can change it by modifying the weretoggle.ini file. This also allows you to transform an unlimited number of times, and extends the duration of the transformation indefinitely.

The screenshot shows my WereFox mod, which can be found here:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=815

Installation Instructions:
Unpack both files in the .zip into your main Skyrim folder

Note: Requires that you have installed Script Dragon, available here:
http://forums.bethsoft.com/index.php?/topic/1292671-rel-script-dragon/page__p__19487488__hl__asi__fromsearch__1#entry19487488

Uninstallation Instructions:
Delete WereToggle.asi and weretoggle.ini in the Skyrim folder.
author: Finadan
